And <S%G2532><s%> when they were <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Salamis <S%G4529><s%>, they preached <S%G2605><s%> <S%G5707><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5707><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> to their minister <S%G5257><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when they had gone through <S%G1330><s%> <S%G5631><s%> the isle <S%G3520><s%> unto <S%G891><s%> Paphos <S%G3974><s%>, they found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5627><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> sorcerer <S%G3097><s%>, a false prophet <S%G5578><s%>, a Jew <S%G2453><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was BarYeshuw`a <S%G919><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> Elymas <S%G1681><s%> the sorcerer <S%G3097><s%> (for <S%G1063><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> is his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> by interpretation <S%G3177><s%> <S%G5743><s%>) withstood <S%G436><s%> <S%G5710><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, seeking <S%G2212><s%> <S%G5723><s%> to turn away <S%G1294><s%> <S%G5658><s%> the deputy <S%G446><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Saul <S%G4569><s%>, (who <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is called SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%>,) filled with <S%G4130><s%> <S%G5685><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> set his eyes <S%G816><s%> <S%G5660><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%>,

Then <S%G5119><s%> the deputy <S%G446><s%>, when he saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%> what was done <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5756><s%>, believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, being astonished <S%G1605><s%> <S%G5746><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the doctrine <S%G1322><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%> and his company <S%G4012><s%> loosed <S%G321><s%> <S%G5685><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Paphos <S%G3974><s%>, they came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Perga <S%G4011><s%> in Pamphylia <S%G3828><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> departing <S%G672><s%> <S%G5660><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%> returned <S%G5290><s%> <S%G5656><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2414><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%> stood up <S%G450><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> beckoning <S%G2678><s%> <S%G5660><s%> with his hand <S%G5495><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Men <S%G435><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%G2475><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye that fear <S%G5399><s%> <S%G5740><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, give audience <S%G191><s%> <S%G5657><s%>.

The 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%G2474><s%> chose <S%G1586><s%> <S%G5668><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> exalted <S%G5312><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> when <S%G1722><s%> they dwelt as strangers <S%G3940><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Egypt <S%G125><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> an high <S%G5308><s%> arm <S%G1023><s%> brought he <S%G1806><s%> <S%G5627><s%> them <S%G846><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> it <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> the time <S%G5550><s%> of forty years <S%G5063><s%> suffered he <S%G5159><s%> their <S%G846><s%> manners <S%G5159><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had destroyed <S%G2507><s%> <S%G5631><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of Chanaan <S%G5477><s%>, he divided <S%G2624><s%> their <S%G846><s%> land <S%G1093><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> by lot <S%G2624><s%> <S%G5656><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that <S%G5023><s%> he gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto them judges <S%G2923><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> the space of four hundred <S%G5071><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fifty <S%G4004><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>, until <S%G2193><s%> SH'mu'el <S%G4545><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%>.

And afterward <S%G2547><s%> they desired <S%G154><s%> <S%G5668><s%> a king <S%G935><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> Saul <S%G4549><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Cis <S%G2797><s%>, a man <S%G435><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Binyamin <S%G958><s%>, by the space of forty <S%G5062><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had removed <S%G3179><s%> <S%G5660><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, he raised up <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> to be <S%G1519><s%> their king <S%G935><s%>; to whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he gave testimony <S%G3140><s%> <S%G5660><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, I have found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5627><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> the son of Yishai <S%G2421><s%>, a man <S%G435><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> mine own <S%G3450><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> shall fulfil <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5692><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> will <S%G2307><s%>.

Of <S%G575><s%> this man's <S%G5127><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> hath <S%G1453><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his promise <S%G1860><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto Yisra'EL <S%G2474><s%> a Saviour <S%G4990><s%>, Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>:

I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> he. But <S%G235><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, there cometh one <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1691><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> shoes <S%G5266><s%> of his feet <S%G4228><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to loose <S%G3089><s%> <S%G5658><s%>.

Men <S%G435><s%> and brethren <S%G80><s%>, children <S%G5207><s%> of the stock <S%G1085><s%> of Avraham <S%G11><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> whosoever among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> feareth <S%G5399><s%> <S%G5740><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, to you <S%G5213><s%> is <S%G649><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G5648><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> though they found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5631><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> cause <S%G156><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> in him, yet desired they <S%G154><s%> <S%G5668><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> should be slain <S%G337><s%> <S%G5683><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> they had fulfilled <S%G5055><s%> <S%G5656><s%> all <S%G537><s%> that was written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5772><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, they took him down <S%G2507><s%> <S%G5631><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the tree <S%G3586><s%>, and laid <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him in <S%G1519><s%> a sepulchre <S%G3419><s%>.

And he <S%G3739><s%> was seen <S%G3700><s%> <S%G5681><s%> many <S%G1909><s%> <S%G4119><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> of them which came up with <S%G4872><s%> <S%G5631><s%> him <S%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the Galil <S%G1056><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2419><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> his <S%G846><s%> witnesses <S%G3144><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> declare <S%G2097><s%> unto you <S%G5209><s%> glad tidings <S%G2097><s%> <S%G5731><s%>, how that <S%G3754><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> which was made <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the fathers <S%G3962><s%>,

'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> hath fulfilled <S%G1603><s%> <S%G5758><s%> the same <S%G5026><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> their <S%G846><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>, in that he hath raised up <S%G450><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> again <S%G450><s%> <S%G5660><s%>; as <S%G5613><s%> it is <S%G1125><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5769><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> psalm <S%G5568><s%>, Thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%>, this day <S%G4594><s%> have I <S%G1473><s%> begotten <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5758><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> as concerning that <S%G3754><s%> he raised <S%G450><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up <S%G450><s%> <S%G5656><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, now no more <S%G3371><s%> to <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5723><s%> return <S%G5290><s%> <S%G5721><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> corruption <S%G1312><s%>, he said <S%G2046><s%> <S%G5758><s%> on this wise <S%G3779><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5692><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> the sure <S%G4103><s%> mercies <S%G3741><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>.
